modName: Super Revealing Translucent Glass Armor for CBBEv2 Females
summary: Translucent Glass Armor Set for CBBEv2 Female bodies.
descriptionHtml:
Updated 1/10/12 03:31 Yeah, I keep wierd hours.

Added Translucent hand and feet armor pieces. 

First off:

Thank you Sinbadthesailor! (member, nexus forums) 

Without your help in creating the meshes, I\'m not sure I ever could have figured this out. Even better, you didn\'t just hand me files on a silver platter, you gave me instructions instead. \"Nothing earned is nothing gained,\" and I learned a lot in the process. If you\'re ever out my way, and you know where I am in the world, I owe you a bottle of bourbon and a fine dinner my friend! 


WARNING:

Nexus forum rules: \"Don\'t like it? Don\'t use it, but pass in silence.\"

NOTE:

I DID NOT MAKE THE WEAPONS NOR ARE THEY LOCATED IN THIS FILE. Please don\'t ask me to make a set. After spending 6 hours banging my head against my keyboard trying to get *my* weapon versions to work, I found out another modder already created them. (doh! yeah, I really said that!) The other mod tested out great on my system and is located here:


http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2454  (caveoabellum, nice work!)


His weapon set includes the 1st person pov work, so I highly suggest you combine my mod with his for the \"full effect.\" 

Instructions:

Must have the CBBEv2 body with fem feet.

The \"heavy\" end _1.nif is based on the \"silly huge\" version. If you don\'t like this, just ~ changeracemenu and set your weight scale down a notch or three. :-)

My glass set has 2 versions. There is the 95% nude version and the super revealing see-through version. Both folders include the transparent shield; (very cool) just pick the one you wish to use and install in the proper locations.

Credits:

Caliente  and Aknot for the CBBEv2 bodies and feet.

Killer Keos for his meshes as a starting point, I could of done this without them, but he indrectly saved me hours of work; \"much appriciated.\" 

Honorable mention and link for Caveoabellium\'s weapons set which matchs my armor.

Forum member Sinbadthesailor for his help/instructions/advice with creating the new mesh(s). Seriously, thanks a million. 

Ido Thoughts:

I haven\'t updated the 1st person POV to make the arms \"translucent yet;\" it\'s not too big of a deal.

The last major piece, the helmet, might take *just* a bit longer. In the meantime, you can run the invisible helmet mod; just run a search on nexus and you\'ll find it.

Tattoo mod lovers, heh, it doesn\'t get much better than this, sans a 100% nude armor mod, and still have an armor rating lol.

I hope you enjoy it,

Jammer
author: Jammer
